item.title: Goodreads review on space
item.description: Review of Space, Place, and Gender by Doreen Massey Review of Taleb Book by Trevor on Goodreads review - interesting philosophy references Fooled by Randomness: The Hidden Role of Chance in Life and in the Markets | Nassim Nicholas Taleb Yeah, you see. Iâ€™ve just checked and most of the other reviews of this book do pretty much what I thought they would do. They complain about the tone. This guy is never going to win an award for modesty and he probably thinks you are stupid and have wasted your life.
